Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back SELF-DRIVE View gallery / Back Connemara © Chris Hill & Tourism Ireland Cliffs of Moher © Chris Hill & Tourism Ireland Christ Church Cathedral Dublin © Failte Ireland Ireland Ireland, The 'Classic' Self Drive 8-Day itinerary • Self drive • Breakfast daily Overview Inclusions Room Type Terms & Conditions Experience Ireland's beauty, history and culture on this classic self-drive itinerary. Exploring Ireland is easy. In the countryside the roads are excellent, well signposted and largely toll free. Distances between towns are short and driving is on the left-hand side of the road, same as in New Zealand. The itinerary can be customised to create your perfect self-drive. View more View less 7 nights + car hire from $ 1609 per person share twin. Flights are additional SELF-DRIVE Enquire now Your inclusions 7 nights hotel accommodation 8 day Standard automatic rental car hire (Dublin return) Breakfast daily Your itinerary Day 1: Dublin Arrive at Dublin Airport, pick up your car rental, and transfer to your hotel. Depending on your arrival time, you could enjoy a tour of Dublin's highlights, such as Trinity College to see the illuminated Book of Kells and the National Museum of Ireland. Overnight in Co. Dublin Day 2: Galway Begin with a sightseeing tour of Dublin. Visit St. Patrick’s Cathedral, Ireland’s largest church, where Jonathan Swift, author of “Gulliver’s Travels,” was once Dean. Optionally, visit one of the distilleries in the city for a whisky tasting. Depart Dublin in the afternoon and head to County Galway. Overnight in Co. Galway Day 3: Connemara Explore Connemara, famous for its contrasting landscapes, granite mountains populated by sheep and hundreds of lakes create a paradise for fishermen. From Galway, travel through Clifden, continuing through the scenic Irish-speaking region of Southern Connemara with its many beautiful lakes. Overnight in Co. Galway Day 4: Kerry Depart for Kerry, traveling through County Clare’s Burren Region, a geological wonderland with over 2,000 plant species and rare flowers or visit the spectacular Cliffs of Moher, a 200-meter wall plunging into the Atlantic Ocean. Continue to Kerry. Overnight in Co. Kerry Day 5: Ring of Kerry Enjoy a tour of the Iveragh Peninsula, known for its stunning scenery—mountains, peat bogs, lakes, and Atlantic Ocean views. Travel through Killorglin, Glenbeigh, and Cahersiveen, birthplace of National hero Daniel O’Connell. Overnight in Co. Kerry Day 6: Dingle Peninsula Tour the Dingle Peninsula, filming location for “Ryan’s Daughter” and “Far and Away.” The area is rich in ancient monuments and is a genuine Irish-speaking region. Enjoy dramatic landscapes and views of the Blasket Islands from Slea Head. Overnight in Co. Limerick Day 7: Dublin Return to Dublin for a free afternoon to explore the city or do some last-minute shopping. Overnight in Co Dublin Day 8: Dublin Depart Dublin for your onward travel arrangements. Room Types 7 night self-drive package 7 night package from $1679 per person share twin Travel 01 Oct - 31 Oct 25 7 night package from $2205 per person share twin Travel 01 Sep - 30 Sep 25 7 night package from $1609 per person share twin Travel 01 Nov - 30 Nov 25 **Customise this itinerary to travel at your own pace. Ask us about upgrading your accommodation or extending your stay.** Flights are additional Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings until sold out • Pricing is subject to availability at the time of booking confirmation and may change without notice. • Advertised prices are per person share twin in NZ dollars for cash or eftpos purchase only. Credit card fees will apply. • Advertised prices are correct as at 01 Sep 25 but may vary due to exchange rates • Airfares are not included and are an additional cost • City Taxes and fees are not included • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • If stated hotels are not available, we reserve the right to confirm similar city centre accommodation • Surcharges and closeout dates may apply • Rental car is based on a standard automatic vehicle and excludes road tolls, one-way rental car fees, fuel, hotel parking charges and surcharges. Rental car terms do vary - please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details. • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full terms and conditions. FINANCE CONDITIONS: Lending criteria, fees, terms & conditions apply. Offer available for bookings made with House of Travel only. Not available for bookings made with MixandMatch. For finance terms and conditions visit hot.co.nz/payment-options.
